com.ibm.team.scm.client
Class SCMPlatform

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.team.scm.client.SCMPlatform

public final class SCMPlatform
extends java.lang.Object

The central client class of the SCM component.

The SCM client provides clients access to the SCM related artifacts in the Jazz repository. This includes APIs for creating and manipulating repository workspaces, streams, change sets, change histories, baselines, and versionable histories. The SCM component APIs make no assumptions about the type of item being versioned, for example it doesn't even know about files. If you want file specific client APIs for loading files from SCM, refer to FileSystemCore.

This class cannot be instantiated or subclassed by clients; all functionality is provided by static methods.

Since:
0.6

setMaxContentThreads

public static void setMaxContentThreads(int count)
Specify the number of simultaneous transfers a content manager session should attempt at once. The parameter to this setter is the default when the number of threads is not explicitly supplied to the content manager.

Parameters:
count - The number of transfers that may occur at the same time. Must be a non-negative number. If zero is specified, then all content transfers will take place in the requesting thread.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the count is less than zero.
Since:
0.7

getMaxContentThreads

public static int getMaxContentThreads()
Get the number of transfers a content manager session should attempt at once. If zero is returned, then all content transfers take place in the requesting thread.

Since:
0.7
